title: Indy 500 Driver Stefan Wilson on 'Think Solar' Campaign (Audio)
itunes:title: Indy 500 Driver Stefan Wilson on 'Think Solar' Campaign (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: British racing driver Stefan Wilson will discuss his aims to make his debut in the 100th running of the Indianapolis 500 as a focal point for his "Think Solar" campaign.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
